author: Shelley
name: Cinnamon-Classic
description:
Cinnamon-Classic 1.4 is a  theme with a classic look  while retaining the Linux Mint Cinnamon original Menu....

Compatible with the latest release of Cinnamon version 1.4.

Changes include:

  • Grey task bar  (Classic Look and Feel)
  • Enlarged Icons and Text with spacing between icons...
  • Classic Gnome 2 feel...

Extract to .themes folder in Home...Select cinnamon-settings from menu...Click on Themes and choose Cinnamon-Classic....

If you are using your computer for productive work, this is the theme to use...We are using this theme for our programming and office/home use....

Change the menu.png file from Cinnamon-settings - Panel

Browse for the menu.png file inside the Cinnamon-Classic 1.4 theme folder....
